analysis.summary: SectionEarn.vue defines a two-column landing section combining translated text, action links (with icons), an image, and a ConnectMetamask widget, plus a rotating background spiral.
analysis.purpose: Provide an “Earn” section on the landing page where users see marketing copy, click through to actions, and connect their MetaMask wallet to claim or view tokens.

components.name: SectionEarn
components.role: This Vue SFC renders the earn section layout, handles translations, and passes props to child components.

components.name: IconInfo
components.role: Renders an informational icon inside the first action link.

components.name: IconEarn
components.role: Renders an earning icon inside the second action link.

components.name: ConnectMetamask
components.role: Displays a connect/switch/add-token UI for MetaMask, driven by tokenAddress, tokenSymbol, tokenDecimals, tokenImage, targetChainId, metamaskIcon, and localized labels.

functions.name: defineProps
functions.purpose: Declare and validate incoming props: content (required translations object) and options (wallet configuration defaults).

functions.name: useI18n
functions.purpose: Initialize the t (translate) and te (translate-exists) helpers scoped to props.content.

functions.name: t
functions.purpose: Return localized string or asset URL for a given key.

functions.name: te
functions.purpose: Check existence of a translation or URL for conditional rendering.

analysis.usage: Imported into a higher-level landing page or router view to display the Earn section; consumed as <SectionEarn :content="..." :options="..."/>.
notes: Uses lazy-loading for images to improve performance.
Applies v-html for title injections—ensure content is sanitized.
Scoped SCSS defines a continuously animating spiral background.
Some Vue imports (computed, ref, reactive, onMounted) are unused and could be cleaned up.
Text and asset URLs are fully driven by the content prop to allow A/B testing or multi-language support.
